basics.name: Nicolas Del Rosario
basics.label: dedicated to building high-quality products.
basics.summary: Frontend-oriented Full Stack Engineer skilled in high-performance React and Next.js apps, scalable backend services with Node.js and Hono, modern real-time architectures, and seamless integration of modern tooling.

work.name: LetyMind
work.summary: I implemented automated messaging using n8n and Hono, reducing manual processing by sending reports and workflow notifications via WhatsApp and email. I also built an error-handling workflow that triggers Discord alerts for failed messages, and am currently developing the platform dashboard to enhance operational efficiency.

work.name: EasyHotel
work.summary: I developed a dynamic hotel detail page using Next.js, where slug-based routing enabled real-time queries to a MySQL database for displaying detailed hotel information. Additionally, I integrated a fully responsive contact form to facilitate seamless customer interactions.

projects.name: Glossary
projects.description: Interactive glossary application that provides comprehensive word definitions, pronunciations, and synonyms.

projects.name: Whatsapp N8N Server
projects.description: REST API server for WhatsApp automation via whatsapp-web.js, made to integrate with n8n workflows.

projects.name: Petcare
projects.description: Veterinary clinic management platform that automates and integrates core services to optimize clinical workflows.

references.name: Ray Del Rosario
references.testimonial: As his older brother, I've had a front-row seat to Nicolas' growth in tech. His dedication, fast learning curve, and genuine passion for building clean, scalable solutions stand out. While we haven’t worked together directly, I fully vouch for his technical abilities and work ethic.

references.name: Geremy Ocsa
references.testimonial: Collaborating with Nicolás on several academic projects was a truly enriching experience. His passion for design and commitment to writing clean, well-structured code consistently elevated the team's output. He also showed strong leadership skills and a genuine ability to collaborate effectively within a group setting.

references.name: Debora Abarca
references.testimonial: Working with Nicolas at EasyHotel was a pleasure. He's a dedicated and skilled Full Stack Developer with a sharp eye for detail and a proactive mindset. A reliable teammate and a true professional.
